Package org.mule.extension.fix.api

Class FIXMessageBuilder

java.lang.Object
org.mule.extension.fix.api.FIXMessageBuilder
public class FIXMessageBuilder extends Object
Builder for constructing FIX protocol messages with proper formatting. Provides convenient methods for creating standard FIX message types.
